content: Furthermore, segments for different game titles and tournaments are also created, and official accounts operated by the game studios can join the community to provide the latest game information and strategies.In addition, based on the interactive one-click to join broadcasterâs game play feature, which is available in our live streaming channels, we launched competition function called Community Contest, enabling users to participate in our game competition with guests, and we are initiating battles in the matching system with just one click.
